column4: Having broken packages problems when installing php5 -- libapache2-mod-php depends on libkrb53 1.4.2 or greater, but 1.3.6-4 is in the repo. Any ideas? Thanks!
yes, it's in the repos, but I'm getting broken packages when apt-get installing it.
can you pastebin the exact error output as well?
it's ammended to the bottom of it.
you should create a new /etc/apt/sources.list and try again.  Yours has some repeated repos and some unoffilcial ones that may be interfering
different but similar error--new sources.list and output at http://paste.ubuntu-nl.org/10131
what does your /etc/apt/sources.list look like now?
never mind--had a different php5-common pre-installed that was getting int he way--looks like it will work now.
